description: For the aspiring karate master, sweep the leg with the Nemesis Pack of Cobra Kai 2: Dojos Rising. Dominate and stun your opponents in the All Valley Tournament mode with 5 exclusive, playable boss characters, including Terry Silver. Then crank up the bass with a choose-your-own track Jukebox mode. The Nemeses: Go to the mat and unleash the martial art skills of Terry Silver, Hammer, Bo, Gabriel, and Skeleton Lord in the All-Valley Tournament mode Jukebox Mode: Choose your track, rock out and punish your enemies with an all-original new score from the official Cobra Kai composers: Zach Robinson and Leo Birenberg
name: Cobra Kai 2: Dojos Rising Nemesis Pack
